node.address: Calle 67B # 60 - 67, Barrio JJ Vargas , Bogota, Colombia

content.value:
Agora Suites is located 5 minutes from the concert and festivals area of ​​Bogotá in a residential and sports area, known as ´the lungs of the city´. An area where you will have access to transport, restaurants, supermarkets and places with the most delicious desserts in the city. The area will give you the possibility to feel like a local and make the most of your experience. From the area you have access to the different touristic sites of Bogotá (20 minutes by car) to the historic center, the T zone, Parque de la 93, Usaquen and the Airport.

In Agora Suites we have a variety of shared bedroom options or private rooms and suites for all types of budgets. We have adapted our bedrooms for your comfort, with light, shelf and locker for each bunk bed. Our private rooms are excellent for those who want their own space, clean and comfortable.

description.description: Agora Suites is the home in Bogota for all travelers and explorers who want to discover the enchanting Colombian. If you are looking for a unique place, full of experience you will enjoy Agora Suites. Agora Suites offers a bicycle rental service, a washing machine and a kitchenette. It is the ideal place to feel at home away from home.
